name: Foundry
description: The Foundry is theTier 4variant of theAnvil Benchthat will allow the Prospector to craft the highest quality tools/weapons available on planet, such as theTitanium Pickaxe,Compound Bow, etc. The Foundry is also capable of craftingTier 2/Tier 3tools and weapons, removing the need for aAnvil BenchandForge.
